/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a vibrant mosaic of urban architecture and greenery. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape.
